skills.name: Frost Nova
desc: Creates An Expanding Ring Of Ice That Damages
And Slows All Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Blizzard
desc: Summons Massive Shards Of Ice To Destroy Your Enemies

skills.name: Frozen Orb
desc: Creates A Magical Globe That Sprays A Torrent Of Ice Bolts
To Lay Waste To Your Enemies

skills.name: Ice Bolt
desc: Creates A Magical Bolt Of Ice
That Damages And Slows Your Enemies

skills.name: Ice Blast
desc: Creates A Magical Sphere Of Ice That
Damages And Freezes Your Enemy

skills.name: Glacial Spike
desc: Creates A Magical Ice Comet
That Freezes Or Kills Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Cold Mastery
desc: Passive - Increases The Damage Of Your Cold Spells
By Piercing Enemies' Resistances To Cold

skills.name: Frozen Armor
desc: Increases Your Defense
And Freezes Enemies That Hit You

skills.name: Shiver Armor
desc: Increases Your Defense
Freezes And Damages Enemies That Hit You

skills.name: Chilling Armor
desc: Increases Defense And Discharges An Ice Bolt In Retaliation
Against Ranged Attackers

skills.name: Static Field
desc: Creates An Electrical Field That Reduces Life
Of All Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Nova
desc: Creates An Expanding Ring Of Lightning
To Shock Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Thunder Storm
desc: Summons A Deadly Thunderstorm That Strikes
Your Enemies With Bolts Of Lightning

skills.name: Charged Bolt
desc: Creates Multiple, Randomly Directed
Bolts Of Electrical Energy

skills.name: Lightning
desc: Creates A Powerful Lightning Bolt
To Lay Waste To Your Enemies

skills.name: Chain Lightning
desc: Creates A Bolt Of Lightning That
Arcs Through Several Targets

skills.name: Lightning Mastery
desc: Passive - Increases All Damage Caused By Your Lightning Spells

skills.name: Telekinesis
desc: Uses The Power Of Your Mind To
Pick Up Items. Use Objects,
And Knock Back Enemies

skills.name: Teleport
desc: Instantly Moves To A Destination Within Your Line Of Sight

skills.name: Energy Shield
desc: Creates A Magical Shield That Consumes Mana
Instead Of Health When You Take Damage

skills.name: Inferno
desc: Creates A Continuous Jet Of Flame
To Scorch Your Enemies

skills.name: Blaze
desc: Creates A Wall Of Fire
In Your Wake To Scorch Your Enemies

skills.name: Fire Wall
desc: Creates A Wall Of Flame That
Burns Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Fire Bolt
desc: Creates A Magical Flaming Missile

skills.name: Fire Ball
desc: Creates An Explosive Sphere Of Fiery Death
To Engulf Your Enemies

skills.name: Meteor
desc: Summons A Meteor From The Heavens
To Crush And Incinerate Your Enemies

bonus.text: {n}: +{0}% Average Fire Damage Per Second Per Level

skills.name: Fire Mastery
desc: Passive - Increases All Damage Caused By Your Fire Spells

skills.name: Warmth
desc: Passive - Increases The Rate At Which You Recover Mana

skills.name: Enchant
desc: Enchants Equipped Weapon Of Targeted Character Or Minion
Adds Fire Damage To Melee Weapons
Adds One-Third Fire Damage To Ranged Weapons

skills.name: Hydra
desc: Summons A Multi-Headed Beast Of Flame
To Reduce Your Enemies To Ashes
